job.title: System Test Engineer
job.description:
Responsibilities:
Test planning, execution, and troubleshooting for RF software/systems issues.
Qualifications:
Strong familiarity with at least one of the following wireless technologies: 5G NR, LTE, 4G, WCDMA,, TD-SCDMA, or CDMA2000
Exposure to programming in Python, C, Perl, shell scripting, etc is a plus
Understanding of Physical/MAC layers and Call Processing concepts in one or more of the following air interface standards 5G (NSA, SA, mmW), LTE, CDMA2000, 1xEV-DO (Rev 0/A/B), GSM/ GPRS /EDGE / Rel99/ Rel5 / HSDPA/ HSUPA/HSPA+.
In depth understanding of wire line and wireless data protocol stacks including RLP, PPP, IP, TCP, IPV6, MIPV6, etc.
